Observation: Revenue Performance Performance of GoU receipts According to the approved budget, the entity was supposed to receive UGX.9.428Bn out of which UGX.8.259Bn was warranted, resulting into a shortfall of UGX.1.169Bn. The shortfall represents 12% of the approved budget. funds that were not warranted were meant for construction of a waiting area for clients and recruitment of field monitoring staff. The Accounting Officer did not provide a response on this matter. The
Recommendation: advised the Accounting Officer to always liaise with MoFPED and MoWT to ensure that all GOU approved funds are released. I
